snippet.title: Super Metroid: Opposition 1.4 - Hack [SNES] Full Gameplay
snippet.description:
Hack Released by Mccad @mccad00  
 Patch 1.4: https://metroidconstruction.com/hack.php?id=620

"Description
The only really playable version of opposition. The project is cancelled, however if you want to access the final area, collect all 4 chozo keys and you can access it. Once you collect the final 2 items in the final area, wait at the elevator till the message "Return to ship" appears and go to the ship and you can leave the planet triggering the ending."

PLAYLISTS:
❖Zelda Hacks & Fangames ►https://bit.ly/48hzv0e
❖Metroid Hacks ► https://bit.ly/metroid_hacks

❖ Mega Man Hacks ► https://bit.ly/3ZjqVKy

❖ Sonic Hacks ► https://bit.ly/3LsO1bY
